answers.answer: Nuts (in moderation), eggs, cheese, meats, low carb snacks.
Do not drink diet soda. Many diabetics do but it is horrible for your health. Diet soda contains aspartame and aspartame is toxic.

For me, cheese or a slice or 2 of lean meat.  A small dill pickle with a tiny bit of cream cheese wrapped in a piece of turkey or lean ham is good too.  Nuts are great, if you can have just a handful.  I can't.  I'm addicted to them. LOL

question: I have type 1 diabetes can you please tell me what the best snacks to have during the day to keep my blood sugar level
title: snacks
